SCU Power Rankings: Week 3

Welcome to the SCU 2017 Power Rankings!

As you may have noticed I am going to try something a little bit different this year for Power Rankings. I learned how to whip one of these sites up a couple weeks ago and thought it would be kind of cool for our Power Rankings. Hopefully I can evolve this thing into something a little more fun but for now you get the rankings online! As always, I will be biased, rude and quick to remind you of my championship history. Enjoy!
